Author: AlvinLeito#0720
Content:
Hey all, I can’t put this in the announcement section and don’t know if its protocol in here to put these things here, but my name is Alvin Leito and I’m the founder of ViisiitCoin/Viisiit., which latter is a new door-to-door tech marketing- service provider, and the former is the utility token, where I want to do a private sale starting in week 45 for, that will be used to reward people we visit for their welcome, attention and/or participation (paid by advertisers, including Viisiit.), so in essence for example in the Netherlands, ViisiitCoin will be the first cryptocurrency that most people will just receive/hold for the first time, and it will be Viisiit.’s challenge to motivate/incentivize the people/mass to start using it, but that’s a challenge I’m gladly willing to take. 

So the interface/wallet/profile needs to be super easy, easier than opening an account on FB, but where people will get ViisiitCoins for the information they fill in their profiles.  

That was just so you guys can get an idea of what I want to do with Viisiit., and if anyone knows anyone/developers looking for a nice challenge (especially since I myself am not technical / don’t know most jargon, yet) in helping me either; make and/or maintain the assetchain on the Komodo network; make and/or maintain the software / platform of Viisiit., then please can you put us in contact with each other? And if its you, yourself, let’s have a chat then 😃

Author: AlvinLeito#0720
Content: FYI: on the frontpage of the website, I’ve put an announcement with an AirDrop challenge, which might be called a bounty challenge, but where the first ViisiitCoins by outsiders can be won
